text: The Christmas Chronicles is a 2018 American Christmas comedy movie directed by Clay Kaytis. The movie stars Kurt Russell, Judah Lewis, and Darby Camp. It is about a brother and sister who, after accidentally crashing Santa Claus' sleigh, must save Christmas. The movie was released on November 22, 2018, by Netflix. It was filmed and set in Chicago, Illinois. ==References== Category:2018 comedy movies Category:American comedy movies Category:Christmas movies Category:Movies shot in Chicago Category:Movies set in Chicago Category:Netflix movies Category:Movies set in 2018
title: The Christmas Chronicles
